Uses of Class
com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.RemoteNode

  • Packages that use RemoteNode 
    Package Description
    com.github.uberroot.ncjbot
    This package contains the classes that form the core of NCJBot.
    com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.api
    This package contains the API for building applications on top of NCJBot.
    com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi
    This package contains the interfaces and classes required to build modules.
    com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modules
    This package contains several default modules.

      Methods in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot with parameters of type RemoteNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean LocalNode.addDiscoveredNode(RemoteNode rn)
      Refreshes the status of the given node and adds it to the active node list if it is not already there.
      void LocalNode.announceFoundNode(RemoteNode rn)
      Alerts the jobs currently running on this node to a new node on the network.
      void LocalNode.announceNodeFailure(RemoteNode rn)
      Alerts the jobs currently running on this node to a failure of a node on the network.
      void RemoteNode.EventListener.nodeConnectionFailed(RemoteNode node)
      This method is called to indicate a communication error occurred while connecting to or communicating with the given node.
      void RemoteNode.EventListener.nodeStateChanged(RemoteNode node, NodeState state)
      This method is called whenever a change is detected in the state of a node.
      void LocalNode.sendData(java.lang.String destTid, java.lang.String sourceTid, RemoteNode source, java.io.File data)
      Delivers data from a remote job to a job running on this node.

      Starts a new job on its own thread with the given parameters.
      Constructors in com.github.uberroot.ncjbot with parameters of type RemoteNode 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteJob(LocalNode node, RemoteNode remoteNode, java.lang.String remoteTid)
      Instantiates a new RemoteJob with the node running the job, as well as the thread id of the running job.
